creator: Swimming Panda Games
descriptionHtml:
Uno is a simple Crazy Eights-style card game, with a bunch of strategy cards thrown in to make it interesting. The best part is that Uno is a FREE game!

Brace yourself for the fast paced Uno Crazy card game. The idea of the game is to get to your last card, shout Uno before another player realises you didn’t, and then attempt to play your last card on your turn to win the round. The player to use up the last card wins the round and is scored based on the cards left in their opponent’s hand.

Each player is dealt 7 cards with the remaining ones placed face down to form a draw pile. The top card of the draw pile is turned over to begin a discard pile.

The objective of the game is to be the first player to shout Uno. Points are scored by ridding yourself of all the cards in your hand before your opponents. You score points for cards left in your opponent's hands.

The first player has to match the card in the discard pile either by number, color or word or the player can throw down a Wild Card. If the player doesn't have anything to match, he must pick a card from the draw pile. If he can play what is drawn, great. Otherwise play moves to the next person.

Wild Card gives the players a chance to experience an all new game changing experience!
When you have one card left, you must shout Uno (meaning one). Failure to do this results in you having to pick two cards from the draw pile. That is, of course if you get caught by the other players.

It's the number and color matching game of cards that's fun and easy for kids of all ages, all for free.

Uno Crazy Card Game is challenging and enjoyable for card players of any skill level and age. When it comes to fun games for the whole family, Uno is the family game that provides hours of entertainment for all.

Like most card games, Uno trains concentration, memory, and reaction time.
It's a fun game to have available when everyone is sitting around bored, looking for something to do.

Unlike lots of other games, Uno Crazy Card Game is still fun even when you have played it many times.

Download Uno Free for your phone and tablets today and have endless hours of fun.

★★★★ Uno Crazy card game Features ★★★★

❖ Three strategic AI players
❖ 3 action cards and 2 Wild cards
❖ Extremely rich UI
❖ Online And Offline Gameplay
❖ Play on Private Tables with friends and family

Don’t forget to Rate and Review Uno so that we can make the game better!
Enjoy playing Uno!!
descriptionShort: Uno Free is a very simple Crazy Eights themed card game. Uno is a free card game

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEW! All new game with all know issues Fixed
IMPORTANT! After updating please make sure allFriends are on the updated version!
Online connections and Private Tables are possible ONLY if all players are on the latest
version of the game!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. RE-CONNECT/RE-JOIN to the game. Now you can attend a phone call or message a friend in between the game and re-join back to the game.
2. Player are not taken out of the game on turn time-out.
3. Minor bug fixes in the game.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
**VOICE CHAT** Voice-chat has been added. You can now do voice chat while playing with your friends online.
**TEXT-CHAT** Not just predefined chat, Text Chat is also added. You can now do text messages to your friends while playing.

Private Tables and Online connections are possible ONLY if all your friends are on the latest version of the game.
